summary.span: 表示一个 8 位无符号整数。

span.span: Represents an 8-bit unsigned integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不可变的值类型，表示无符号的整数，其范围从 0 的值 (这由常量) 到 255 (这由常量)。 is an immutable value type that represents unsigned integers with values that range from 0 (which is represented by the constant) to 255 (which is represented by the constant). .NET Framework 还包括 8 位有符号的整数值类型， ，它表示介于-128 到 127 之间的值。The .NET Framework also includes a signed 8-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from -128 to 127. ## 实例化一个字节值Instantiating a Byte Value 可以实例化有几个方面的值：You can instantiate a value in several ways: - 你可以声明变量并将其分配的范围内的整数值数据类型。You can declare a variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下面的示例声明了两个变量并将它们分配在这种方式中的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#1)] - 可以将非字节的数字值分配给一个字节。You can assign a non-byte numeric value to a byte. 这是收缩转换，因此如果需要强制转换运算符在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的转换方法`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 如果非字节值为， ，或包括小数组件，其小数部分处理的值取决于编译器执行转换。If the non-byte value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 以下示例将分配到的几个数值变量。The following example assigns several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#2)] - 你可以调用的方法类能够将任何支持的类型到值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to a value. 这是可能因为支持接口。This is possible because supports the interface. 下面的示例阐释了数组的转换值复制到值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte1.vb#4)] - 你可以调用或方法将转换的字符串表示形式值赋给。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of a value to a . 字符串可以包含十进制或十六进制数字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下面的示例演示使用十进制和十六进制字符串分析操作。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/cs/byteinstantiation1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.instantiation/vb/byteinstantiate1.vb#3)] ## 对字节值执行操作Performing Operations on Byte Values 类型支持标准的数学运算，例如加法、 减法、 除法、 乘法、 减法、 求反和一元求反。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, subtraction, negation, and unary negation. 与其他整数类型，类似类型还支持的按位`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左移位和右移位运算符。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 你可以使用标准数值运算符比较两个值，也可以调用或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 你还可以调用的成员类来执行各种数值操作，包括获取绝对值的数值的数字，计算商和整数除法运算的余数确定两个最大或最小值整数，获取数字的符号和舍入数。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## 表示作为字符串的一个字节Representing a Byte as a String 类型提供对标准和自定义数字格式字符串的完全支持。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (有关详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)但是，大多数情况下，字节值表示为一位到三位数字值不带任何其他格式，或作为两位数的十六进制值。(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) However, most commonly, byte values are represented as one-digit to three-digit values without any additional formatting, or as two-digit hexadecimal values. 若要设置格式值为一个不带前导零的整数字符串，您可以调用的无参数方法。To format a value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 通过使用"D"格式说明符，您还可以包含指定的数目的字符串表示形式中的前导零。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 通过使用"X"格式说明符，您可以表示十六进制字符串形式的值。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent a value as a hexadecimal string. 下面的示例在一个数组中的元素进行格式设置以下三种方式中的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these three ways. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#1)] 你还可以设置格式通过调用十进制或十六进制字符串值作为二进制、 八进制方法并提供将基作为该方法的第二个参数。You can also format a value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下面的示例调用此方法以显示二进制、 八进制和十六进制表示形式的字节值数组。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of byte values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/cs/formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.formatting/vb/formatting1.vb#2)] ## 使用非十进制字节值Working with Non-Decimal Byte Values 除了使用作为十进制值单个字节时，你可能想要执行带字节值的按位运算，或对字节数组或字节值的二进制或十六进制表示起。In addition to working with individual bytes as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with byte values, or work with byte arrays or with the binary or hexadecimal representations of byte values. 例如，重载的方法可以将每个基元数据类型转换为字节数组和方法将为字节数组的值。For example, overloads of the method can convert each of the primitive data types to a byte array, and the method converts a value to a byte array. 值以表示 8 位由它们的量，而无需符号位。 values are represented in 8 bits by their magnitude only, without a sign bit. 这是重要上执行按位运算时，需要注意值或当你处理的单个位进行运算。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要执行数字、 布尔值或对任何两个非十进制值的比较操作，这两个值都必须使用相同的表示形式。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation. 当对两个执行操作值，值将共享相同的表示形式，因此结果为准确。When an operation is performed on two values, the values share the same representation, so the result is accurate. 这一点在以下示例中，了屏蔽的最低顺序位值，以确保它为偶数。This is illustrated in the following example, which masks the lowest-order bit of a value to ensure that it is even. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise1.vb#1)] 另一方面，当使用无符号和有符号位时，按位运算复杂的这一事实，值使用符号数值表示法正值，和负数值的补数表示形式.On the other hand, when you work with both unsigned and signed bits, bitwise operations are complicated by the fact that the values use sign-and-magnitude representation for positive values, and two's complement representation for negative values. 若要执行有意义的按位运算，值必须转换为等效的两个表示形式，并且必须保留符号位有关的信息。In order to perform a meaningful bitwise operation, the values must be converted to two equivalent representations, and information about the sign bit must be preserved. 下面的示例这样做是为了出 2 和 4 的 8 位有符号和无符号值的数组的位掩码。The following example does this to mask out bits 2 and 4 of an array of 8-bit signed and unsigned values. [!code-csharp[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/cs/bitwise2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.Bitwise#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.byte.bitwise/vb/bitwise2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现接口，并且执行效果略好于方法因为它不具有要转换`value`对对象的参数。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 具体取决于您的编程语言，它可能会对代码其中的参数类型具有较少的位的方法 （为较窄） 比实例类型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 这可能是因为某些编程语言中执行的隐式的扩大转换，它表示具有任意数量的位的实例作为类型参数。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假设实例类型是和参数类型是。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 编译器生成的指令来表示形式的参数值，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an , then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅你的编程语言的文档，以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式的扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型和非泛型版本的`CompareTo`多个值和引用类型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and non-generic versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`参数包含一个数字的窗体：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][sign]digits[ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表描述每个元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选的正整数或负号。An optional positive or negative sign.| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了字节值的十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. (如果登录不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发。)若要显式定义可出现在的样式元素`s`，可以使用两种或方法。(If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an .) summary.span: 将当前 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 此对象的值的字符串表示形式，由一系列从 0 到 9 之间的数字组成，不包含前导零。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this object, which consists of a sequence of digits that range from 0 to 9 with no leading zeroes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G") 和线程的当前区域性的对象。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G") and the object for the thread current culture. 若要定义的格式设置值的字符串表示形式，请调用方法。To define the formatting of the value's string representation, call the method. 若要定义格式说明符和区域性用于创建的字符串表示形式值时，请调用方法。To define both the format specifiers and culture used to create the string representation of a value, call the method. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . ## Examples 下面的示例显示一个字节值数组。The following example displays an array of byte values. 请注意，不在示例中显式调用方法。Note that the method is not called explicitly in the example. 相反，它是隐式调用，因为使用了[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能。Instead, it is called implicitly, because of the use of the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature. [!code-cpp[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CPP/newbytemembers2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CS/NewByteMembers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/VB/NewByteMembers.vb#2)]

param.name: provider
param.span: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

summary.span: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息将当前 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the numeric value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 此对象值的字符串表示形式，采用 参数所指定的格式。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this object in the format specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。The return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). `provider`参数是一个对象，实现接口。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法返回提供此方法返回的字符串的格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象可以是任何以下：The object that implements can be any of the following: - A代表要使用其格式设置规则的区域性的对象。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - A对象，其中包含特定的数字格式设置信息，此值。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现一个自定义对象。A custom object that implements . 如果`provider`是`null`或对象不能从获取`provider`，返回值的格式使用线程的当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例循环的字节数组值，并向控制台显示每个通过调用使用不同的格式提供程序的方法。The following example iterates an array of byte values and displays each of them to the console by calling the method with different format providers. [!code-cpp[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CPP/newbytemembers.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/CS/NewByteMembers.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Byte.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Byte.ToString/VB/NewByteMembers.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). 此函数的返回值格式都是使用线程的当前区域性的对象。The return value of this function is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . 若要提供区域性而非当前区域性的格式设置信息，请调用方法。To provide formatting information for cultures other than the current culture, call the method. .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化值并将其显示到控制台中使用的每个受支持的标准格式字符串和一个自定义格式字符串。The following example initializes a value and displays it to the console using each of the supported standard format strings and a custom format string. 使用 EN-US 时的情况下，该示例运行与当前的区域性。The example is run with en-US as the current culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式采用指定区域性的指定格式的值。The method formats a value in a specified format of a specified culture. 若要使用当前区域性的默认值 ("G") 格式来格式化数字，调用方法。To format a number by using the default ("G") format of the current culture, call the method. 若要通过使用当前区域性的指定的格式将数字格式，调用方法。To format a number by using a specified format of the current culture, call the method. `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，此方法返回值的格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value of this method is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). `provider`参数是一个对象，实现接口。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法返回提供此方法返回的字符串的格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象可以是任何以下：The object that implements can be any of the following: - A代表要使用其格式设置规则的区域性的对象。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - A对象，其中包含特定的数字格式设置信息，此值。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现一个自定义对象。A custom object that implements . 如果`provider`是`null`或对象不能从获取`provider`，返回值的格式使用线程的当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关线程的当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用标准的"N"格式字符串和第四个不同要向控制台显示的字符串表示形式的字节值的对象。The following example uses the standard "N" format string and four different objects to display the string representation of a byte value to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 则转换失败，并且该方法返回`false`如果`s`参数不是格式正确，如果它是`null`或，或如果它表示的数字小于或大于。The conversion fails and the method returns `false` if the `s` parameter is not in the correct format, if it is `null` or , or if it represents a number less than or greater than . 方法类似于是方法，只不过不会引发异常，如果转换失败。The method is similar to the method, except that does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`参数应为以下形式的数字的字符串表示：The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the following form: ``` [ws][sign]digits[ws] ``` 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表描述每个元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|可选的正号，由指定当前区域性的属性。An optional positive sign, as specified by the property of the current culture.| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的十进制数字的序列。A sequence of decimal digits that range from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了字节值的十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to the byte value's decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. (如果登录不存在，它必须是正号或该方法将引发。)若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在区域性特定格式设置信息`s`，使用方法。(If the sign is present, it must be a positive sign or the method throws an .) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数为当前区域性的对象。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object for the current culture. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 此重载方法将解释中的所有位`s`为十进制数字的参数。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要分析的字符串表示形式的十六进制数，请调用重载。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例调用与大量的不同字符串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像是方法，除了方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数通过提供对象`provider`参数。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object supplied by the `provider` parameter. 样式参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空白或正号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。The style parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必须是中的位标志的组合枚举。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 根据值`style`、`s`参数可能包括以下元素：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws][ws][$][sign]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`参数包含:Or, if the `style` parameter includes : [ws]hexdigits[ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 方括号 （[和]） 中是可选元素。Elements in square brackets ( [ and ] ) are optional. 下表描述每个元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space. 空格可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括标志，或如果样式包括 s 末尾标志。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of s if style includes the flag.| |*$*|特定于区域性的货币符号。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字符串中的位置由属性返回对象方法`provider`参数。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括标志。The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*sign**sign*|可选的正号。An optional positive sign. (分析操作失败，如果一个负号位于`s`。)符号可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括标志。(The parse operation fails if a negative sign is present in `s`.) The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*digits**digits*|一系列从 0 到 9 的数字。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.| |*.**.*|特定于区域性的小数点符号。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 指定的区域性的小数点符号`provider`可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括标志。The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*|数字 0 的一个或多个匹配项。One or more occurrences of the digit 0. 小数位数可以出现在`s`才`style`包括标志。Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the flag.| |*e**e*|E 或 E 字符，它指示的值用在指数记数法表示。The e or E character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`参数可以表示指数记数法的数字，如果`style`包括标志。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一系列从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 F.的十六进制数字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| 仅为十进制数字的字符串 (它对应于样式) 总是可以分析成功。A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the style) always parses successfully. 其余的大多数成员控件可能但不是要求必须包含在此输入字符串中的元素。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string. 下表指示个别成员影响中可能存在的元素`s`。The following table indicates how individual members affect the elements that may be present in `s`. |非复合 NumberStyles 值Non-composite NumberStyles values|除数字之外的 s 中允许的元素Elements permitted in s in addition to digits| *fractional_digits*仅一个或多个数字 0 或该方法将返回必须组成`false`。However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or the method returns `false`.| ||`s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation. 如果`s`表示一个数字指数记数法时，它必须表示的范围内的整数不带非零小数部分的数据类型。If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the data type without a non-zero,
